charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1101_0100_20:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] arrived at the cave 
where Koga had asked [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="him" F="her" ] to meet him.
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1101_0200_20: However, Koga was nowhere to be seen.
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1201_0400_10:
You will never find me if you depend only on
your eyes!
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1201_0500_10:
Sharpen your senses! 
Find me with more than just your vision!
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1101_0600_20:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] closed [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="his" F="her" ] eyes to
try to sense Koga in the darkness.
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_0401_0800_10: Well, well! Good senses you have there!
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1201_1100_10:
To think that you could see past my ninja
techniques so well!
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1201_1200_10:
But! Not good enough!
Wouldn’t you say, partner?
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1201_1300_10:
I’m just saying that you let down your guard!
You became careless just because you found me!
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1201_1400_10:
What you see is not everything there is. Being
able to see what is not visible is most crucial!
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1201_1500_10:
Read what your opponent is thinking and
decipher their strategies to claim the flow
of battle as your own!
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1201_1600_10:
And you will need an unwavering 
willpower in order to do this!
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1201_1700_10:
My dojo has been training for 400 years 
how to be calm at all times!
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1201_1800_10:
The reason I called you out here today was to
teach you the secrets of being a ninja.
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1201_2100_10: You really don’t emote much, do you?
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1201_2200_10: But I’m sure you’re surprised nonetheless, right?
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_0401_2400_10:
Well, I see that you have your emotions under
control. That is good.
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_0402_2600_10: I knew it! You worried me a little bit!
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1201_2700_10: But prepare yourself. We have only just begun.
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1201_2800_10:
I would recommend you don’t take Crobat’s
techniques or speed lightly!
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1201_2900_10:
Fwahaha! I see Crobat’s Double Team is causing
you trouble!
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1201_3000_10:
You must be quite surprised!
I see it in your face!
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1201_3100_10:
We’re only able to pull off combination moves
like this because of how in sync we are.
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1201_3200_10:
We can do this without any planning—with only
shared experience and eye contact!
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1201_3300_10:
You should understand how difficult synchronicity
like that can be. But if you can achieve it, it will
prove a great power for you and your Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_0401_3500_10: Of course! I know you can!
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_0302_3600_10: Do you think we can do it, too?
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_0402_3700_10: Of course! I know you can!
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1201_3800_10:
But all this is why you must never let your guard
down, especially since you and your Pokémon
have such a strong bond.
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1201_3900_10:
You cannot cut corners at the PML.
Or rather, there are not many Trainers here
that you can win against by cutting corners.
charaepi_ch0054_00_kyo/2301_1201_4000_10:
I’m looking forward to seeing if your bond can
overcome ours!
